name: Masha and the Bear Clean House
name_original: Masha and the Bear Clean House
description:
The yard is not swept, the clothes are not washed! And who will clean up all the mess? Of course, restless Masha! Now the boring cleaning process will become an interesting and exciting adventure! All this in the new game from Indigo Kids - "Masha and the Bear: House Cleaning"!

- 3 different locations: Masha's Room, the Yard and the Big Wash
- original voice acting from the cartoon "Masha and the Bear"
- 5 fascinating mini-games to develop logic and memory
- perform many exciting tasks together with Masha

Masha decided to do a spring cleaning and there are going to be a lot of work - she need to clean the room, sweep the yard and wash her clothes. But she can’t manage the cleaning without help. Are you ready to join Masha?

Our game teaches kids everything they need to know about tidying up the house. How to arrange things in places and sew in patches, wipe the dust, sweep and wash floors, do the laundry and iron clothes and much more! Look at all this mess! Never mind, with Masha’s guidance we will put everything in order in no time! And, of course, there will be a gift for our efforts. Make the place clean and beautiful, and get real pleasure from it!

In an interesting interactive playing form, your child learns to appreciate the cleanliness and order, and even develop logical abilities. Let’s put the things back in their places - combine pleasant with useful, cheerful and cognitive!

Cleaning begins at home. The room is such a mess, as if the hurricane was here! We urgently need to sew up pillows and toys, put everything back on the shelves and wipe the dust. Don’t forget to collect all the magic items in our chest of wonders! Wash the floors, collect sweets and go further. The animals made a real disorder in the yard! After cleaning the house you need to tidy the yard - remove all the rubbish. Leaves that are scattered throughout the yard need to be placed into the album for the herbarium. Finally, you need to help Masha wash herself after all this messy work and do the laundry.

She can’t deal with all the mess without your help, but together you could take care of everything! Let’s train dexterity and ingenuity by playing!
